CustomField.description:
Added as part of GTMS-18362 (GTMS-19824).
Field used in RoundRobinHandler to compare Account> Owner > Role Name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use brackets to evaluate logic first within the brackets. Use '!' -> For 'Not' logic. Use '&&' -> For 'And' logic. Use '||' -> For 'OR' logic. Use '_' -> For space between a single word.
CustomField.label: Owner Role
